status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.body:
Hello,

We have not heard back from you since our last update. Please let me know if the issue has been resolved and if this ticket can be closed.  However, you can reopen the ticket when you need.

Thanks
